CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 墙壁；内壁；外壁；隔断；堤坝；屏障；隔阂；防御工事；峭壁；隔膜；（器官的）壁；（心理的）障碍；回球墙；（书架等的）侧板；（冲浪）陡浪
给…建墙；用墙围住；筑墙保护；把…关起来；包围（某人或某物）以限制自由
墙的；墙上的；爬墙的；靠墙的；沿墙的

word_group.phrase: the writing is on the wall

word_group.brief_definition: 奇妙的, 有点儿出格的
(因缺少资金)走投无路, 失败, 破产, 陷于绝境
嵌在银行外墙上的）自动取款机；昏暗的小酒吧

bilingual.target: 这是一堵非常古老的墙。

bilingual.source: There are many flowers near the wall.
There's a screen in front of the wall.
Then point to a wall in the classroom.
This makes it the longest wall in the world.
bilingual.target: 这使它成为世界上最长的墙。

list.abstract: wall（英[wɔːl]，美[wɔːl]），英文单词，作名词为围墙；壁垒。作动词为用墙围住；砌墙封闭。短语搭配有wall painting（壁画）。例句为“The wall was covered with ivy.（墙上长满了常春藤。）” wall的名词近义词有fence；及物动词近义词有inwall；形容词近义词有mural。

yingyinNormal.en: Beyond that wall, there are savage people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在那堵墙之外，都是些野人。

yingyinNormal.en: I do. He's on the other side of this wall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我知道，他在墙的另外一边。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, let's ask my wall of 374 consecutive employee-of-the-month awards.
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我们问问我的连续374届获得月度最佳员工的记录墙吧！

yingyinNormal.en: That's great. Now, get back against the wall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说得对。靠墙站好。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig is going to knock the nail into the wall. Don't break the wall, Daddy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸要把钉子钉进墙里面去。别把墙弄坏了，爸爸。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, but... An octagon has eight sides. But a wall, okay? A Wall's like this, see?
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，可是八边形有八条边，但一面墙，墙是这样子的，看见了吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig is going to knock the nail into the wall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸要把钉子钉进墙里面去。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig has to mend the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸必须在妈妈回来前把墙修好。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy Pig has to mend the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.
yingyinNormal.zh: 猪爸爸必须在妈妈回来前把墙修好。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't be silly, Peppa. Easy as pie. Oh, it's not meant to do that. Daddy Pig has made a big crack in the wall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不用担心，佩奇。小菜一碟。墙不应该这样的。墙被爸爸弄出了好几条裂缝。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't be silly, Peppa. Easy as pie. Oh, it's not meant to do that. Daddy Pig has made a big crack in the wall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不用担心，佩琪。小菜一碟。墙不应该这样的。墙被爸爸弄出了好几条裂缝。

yingyinNormal.en: And so was Franklin. He was alone. And there was a wall between them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 富兰克林也是，一个人。他们之间隔着墙。

yingyinNormal.en: What was that? I just put my fist through another wall. Tell the guys.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么声音？我又槌墙了，告诉钱德和乔伊。

yingyinNormal.en: It's okay I'm alright. Just a couple of rounds with a wall and lost.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没关系我很好。只是打了几下墙还有些失落。

yingyinNormal.en: It's coming out. Oh, Daddy. Now you really have broken the wall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 要拔出来了。噢，爸爸。现在你是真的把墙弄坏了。

yingyinNormal.en: When did we get a wall safe? When there was no more room in the floor safe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 墙式保险箱什么时候装的？在地板保险箱装满之后啊。

yingyinNormal.en: You've broken the wall. It's just a tiny crack. The picture will hide it. There.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你把墙给弄坏了。只是几条小裂缝而已，会遮住它们的。像这样。

yingyinNormal.en: There's an invisible wall standing between us and them and nobody's doing anything about it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们与他们之间有道无形的墙，而大家都没在想办法解决。

yingyinNormal.en: Next, Daddy Pig puts plaster over the bricks. Easy as pie. Then Daddy Pig paints the wall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接着，猪爸爸把水泥糊在砖上。小菜一碟。最后把墙粉刷好。

yingyinNormal.en: Next, Daddy Pig puts plaster over the bricks. Easy as pie! Then Daddy Pig paints the wall.
yingyinNormal.zh: 接着，猪爸爸把水泥糊在砖上。小菜一碟。最后把墙粉刷好。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: the writing is on the wall

sense_info_list.en: one of the sides of a room or building

examination_example.sentence: Elaborate <highlight>wall</highlight> and ceiling stenciling and marquetry floors decorated the office of the Secretary.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 精致的墙壁，镂花天花板以及镶嵌式地板装饰了秘书处办公室。

examination_example.sentence: Does that mean the writing is on the <highlight>wall</highlight> for all European royals, with their magnificent uniforms and majestic lifestyles?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是否意味着所有衣着华丽、生活高贵的欧洲皇室成员将有大难了？

examination_example.sentence: Comprising artists Mark Boyle and Joan Hills and their children, they recreated random sections of the British landscape on gallery <highlight>walls</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们由艺术家马克·博伊尔、琼·希尔斯和他们的孩子组成，在画廊的墙上随意地再现了英国风景。

sense_info_list.en: a long narrow vertical structure made of stone or brick that surrounds or divides an area of land.

examination_example.sentence: Many of the most celebrated national figures have participated in historical events that have taken place within the EEOB's granite <highlight>walls</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多最著名的国家人物都参与了发生在EEOB花岗岩墙内的历史事件。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>Wall</highlight> Street Journal finds that "a substantial part" of executive pay is now tied to performance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 华尔街日报发现，高管薪酬的“很大一部分”现在与业绩挂钩。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: one of the sides of a room or building

examination_example.sentence: Create a <highlight>wall</highlight> of water between the raging fire and the two towers on the west of the building.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在熊熊大火和建筑西边的两座塔楼之间筑起一道水墙。

examination_example.sentence: The cathedral has been at a years-long dispute over who should finance restoration work of the collapsing staircases, crumbling statues and cracked <highlight>walls</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多年来，这座教堂一直处于争论之中，争论的焦点是谁应该为坍塌的楼梯、破碎的雕像和破裂的墙壁的修复工作提供资金。

sense_info_list.en: a layer of material enclosing space

word_usage.usage:
wall表“墙壁, 围墙”，为可数名词。in the wall表示“在墙的里面”; 而on the wall表示“在墙的表面”。
示例：你看到墙上的洞了吗?
Have you seen the hole in the wall?

the Great Wall（长城）是the Great Wall of China（中国长城）的简称。
示例：She visited the Great Wall last year.
她去年参观了长城。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: one of the sides of a room or building

examination_example.sentence: Every day after school, Joe's dad drives him to the restaurant so he can put his ideas straight on the <highlight>wall</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每天放学后，乔的爸爸开车送他去餐馆，这样他就可以把他的想法直接画在墙上。

examination_example.sentence: I know I could probably repaint the <highlight>walls</highlight> in my house over a weekend or something, but not a full renovation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我知道我可能会在一个周末之类的时间里重新粉刷我家的墙壁，但不会完全翻新。

examination_example.sentence: It turns dirty <highlight>walls</highlight> into artistic works.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它把肮脏的墙壁变成了艺术作品。

sense_info_list.en: a layer of material enclosing space

examination_example.sentence: Several of the mice are observed running around the cage <highlight>walls</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 观察到几只老鼠在笼子的四周奔跑。

examination_example.sentence: When parents engage in play with their children, it builds a <highlight>wall</highlight> against the harmful effects of all kinds of stress, including poverty.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 父母与孩子玩耍时，能为孩子筑起一道屏障来抵御各种压力的有害影响，包括贫困。

word_usage.usage:
the Great Wall（长城）是the Great Wall of China（中国长城）的简称。
示例：She visited the Great Wall last year.
她去年参观了长城。

wall表“墙壁, 围墙”，为可数名词。in the wall表示“在墙的里面”; 而on the wall表示“在墙的表面”。
示例：你看到墙上的洞了吗?
Have you seen the hole in the wall?

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 围墙；墙；墙壁；壁垒；屏障；峭立面；人墙；围住矿脉（或矿层）的岩石

sense_info_list.en: one of the sides of a room or building

examination_example.sentence: It took us about 3 hours to go all the way around the Xi'an City <highlight>Wall</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们绕着西安城墙从始至终走了大约3个小时。

examination_example.sentence: The Xi'an City <highlight>Wall</highlight> is the most complete city <highlight>wall</highlight> that has survived China's long history.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 西安城墙是中国悠久历史上留存最完整的城墙。

examination_example.sentence: The large color decisions in your rooms concern the <highlight>walls</highlight>, ceilings, and floors.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 房间主色调的选择与墙壁、天花板和地板有关。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 围墙；墙；墙壁；壁垒；屏障；峭立面；人墙；围住矿脉（或矿层）的岩石

sense_info_list.en: one of the sides of a room or building

examination_example.sentence: We were told it is the longest <highlight>wall</highlight> in the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们被告知这是世界上最长的墙。

examination_example.sentence: Some of the caves even have paintings on the <highlight>walls</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有些洞穴的墙上甚至有画。

examination_example.sentence: On the <highlight>wall</highlight> were a hundred colored paper butterflies, each with a handwritten message on it from my students.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 墙上有一百只彩纸蝴蝶，每只蝴蝶上都有我的学生手写的信息。

word_usage.usage:
wall表“墙壁, 围墙”，为可数名词。in the wall表示“在墙的里面”; 而on the wall表示“在墙的表面”。
示例：你看到墙上的洞了吗?
Have you seen the hole in the wall?

the Great Wall（长城）是the Great Wall of China（中国长城）的简称。
示例：She visited the Great Wall last year.
她去年参观了长城。
